authorizeAndSell(bytes32,uint256,address.details: If the user already own a DSGuard but isn't authorized, authorizes the marketplace contract and sell

params._discount: 4 digit number representing a discount of CDP value (0-9999)

createAuthorizeAndSell(bytes32,uint256,a.details: Creates a new DSGuard for the user, authorizes the marketplace contract and puts on sale the cdp

params._discount: 4 digit number representing a discount of CDP value (0-9999)

give(bytes32,address).details: Called by the Marketplace contract, will give CDP only if you're authorized or CDP owner

params._newOwner: Transfer the CDP to this address

sell(bytes32,uint256,address).details: Put a cdp on sale, if the user already has a DSGuard and authorized it

params._discount: 4 digit number representing a discount of CDP value (0-9999)
